parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster to be added.

parameters.name: DiscoveryOnly
parameters.description: Indicates whether to add the cluster to an ASM instance in only service discovery mode.

parameters.name: IgnoreNamespaceCheck
parameters.description: Specifies whether to check that the cluster you want to add to the ASM instance belongs to the istio-system namespace. This parameter is often used in scenarios where you migrate traffic from self-managed open source Istio to ASM. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the Service Mesh (ASM) instance.
